trends: There have been 2 other sightings in South Portland
There were no other sightings in South Portland on or around November 28th 2011
Summary: upside down half of triangle glowing like fire with lights blinking hovering it fell twords the ground and disapeared, Than reappeared to the right
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were driving home from Lewiston Maine on I-95 North, Shorty before the Weymouth overpass to the right of our vehicle in the sky was a bright half of triangle glowing as if it were burning with flashing lights it started to fall towards the ground then seemed to disappear and reappeared higher in elevation and further to the right, There was no noise given from the object but that is not for sure as we were in the vehicle, My son and i both witnessed the same event and were shouting "What is that!?" There is no way possible that this was any man made air craft, it moved too fast. We were hoping you could provide us with any information of other sightings or any information at all because other people must have saw it, there were alot of people on the highway
